creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: red and white on black background fabric; multicolor satin stitch figures and floral patterns; large square with two wide bands above; red wool extensions edged and lined in indigo cotton; remnants of yellow metal-wrapped edging surround individual motifs; lined in indigo cotton; silk embroidery threads
title: Baby Carrier
